result.execSummary:
The defendant Denis John Serres Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order - Temporary Restraining Order [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.12(8)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes:
Provide a DNA sample. Pay all mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA & DV surcharges during period of probation, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
- Restitution set at ZERO.
- No Contact with firearms. Court advised that under 48 USC Section 922(g)(9) the defendant is prohibited from possession of a firearm after conviction of a crime of domestic violence.
- NO VIOLENT CONTACT with victim Cathleen G.

- Batterers Intervention Program.
- Mental health evaluation, comply with recommended treatment.
- Treatment and/or counseling as determined by agent.

- AODA assessment, comply with recommended treatment.
- Absolute sobriety.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Denis John Serres Jr

records.addlTxt: REQUEST TO ISSUE CIVIL JUGMENT FOR RESTITUTION RECEIVED AND FORWARDED TO ALI. OS
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report dated 11-01-2016; received and filed.

Defendant Denis John Serres in court PRO SE.  William P. Dockry appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC.  Probation Agent is in court.  Probation Status Review report filed and reviewed.  Defendant is compliant or mostly compliant with probation.  The remaining condition time is stayed.  Court found that further review is not needed.

Defendant Denis John Serres in court with attorney Robert N. Meyeroff.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC.  Sentencing Proceeded. Statements by parties, Cathleen G., and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1
The court sentenced the defendant to 9 MONTHS in the House of Correction, with credit for 4 days time served.  Court STAYED sentence and placed defendant on PROBATION for 18 MONTHS.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION
-Serve 30 days in the House of Correction as Condition Time, STAYED pending review.
-Batterers Intervention program.
-Mental health evaluation, comply with recommended treatment.
-AODA assessment, comply with recommended treatment.
-Absolute sobriety.
-Treatment and/or counseling as determined by agent.
-No VIOLENT contact with victim Cathleen G.
-No contact with firearms.
-Pay all MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA & DV surcharges during period of probation, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. 
-Restitution set at ZRO.
-Provide DNA Sample.

*Court advised that under 48 USC Section 922(g)(9) the defendant is prohibited from possession of a firearm after conviction of a crime of domestic violence.

Filed: 
-Memorandum of Conditions of Probation

Probation Review Hearing in branch 24.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for June 24, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Denis John Serres in court with attorney Robert N. Meyeroff.  Sarah Zwach appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Case set for Final Pretrial. Parties have reached a resolution. Court VACATES Jury Trial. 

AS TO COUNT 1
Defendant changes plea(s) to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to plea, advised of Constitutional Rights and the maximum penalties. Court found that the defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived rights.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights form and Addendum received and filed. Parties stipulate to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea(s).  Court found defendant GUILTY and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

AS TO COUNT 2
Pursuant to plea negotiations, on motion of the state, court ordered count 2 Dismissed, But Read In. 

Received and Filed, Pretrial Incarceration Credit Form and Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief. 

Case adjourned to branch 24 for Sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.
Victim present in court requesting modification of the No Contact order.  State opposes.  Court orders the No Contact order to remain.

Defendant Denis John Serres in court with attorney Robert N. Meyeroff.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests case reviewed for DPA and requests an adjourned Final Pretrial. Court grants defense request. Case remains scheduled for Jury Trial on 3/28/2016 at 8:30 am. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 22, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.

Defendant Denis John Serres in court with attorney Robert N. Meyeroff.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case adjourned in branch 24.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Denis John Serres in court with attorney Danielle Louise Shelton.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Court grants defense request. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for March 28, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed, Justice Point Report.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with CJG dob 7/25/63 or Jo N.

Defendant Denis John Serres in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Defendant Denis John Serres in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 20, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Denis John Serres Jr

Prior: 4304 North Sheffield Avenue, Shorewood, WI 53211
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
